ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the IO ID is a number.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && NOT( ISBLANK( Intelligent_Office_ID__c ) ) && NOT( ISNUMBER( Intelligent_Office_ID__c ) ) && NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.OW_user_type__c,"Integration"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The IO ID must be a number.
